alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 1:57PM PST until January 31 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Windy conditions are anticipated along Interstate 84.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
